entry.source: 〉 Kaga is facing a group of demons.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Kaga is facing a group of demons.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Kaga\0{F87A,140}{F87B,140,12,1,1}{F813,0,112002}Well, good timing. Here, I'll let{F801}you take care of one of them!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Kaga\0{F87A,140}{F87B,140,12,1,1}{F813,0,112002}Well, good timing. Here, I'll let{F801}you take care of one of them!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Kaga turned to confront another of{F801}the demons.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Kaga turned to confront another of{F801}the demons.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,112004}You bested that demon on your own...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,112004}You bested that demon on your own...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Kaga\0{F87A,140}{F813,0,112005}There are lots of folks in the Ring{F801}of Gaea as strong as me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Kaga\0{F87A,140}{F813,0,112005}There are lots of folks in the Ring{F801}of Gaea as strong as me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Kaga\0{F87A,140}{F813,0,112006}By the way, what were your names?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Kaga\0{F87A,140}{F813,0,112006}By the way, what were your names?{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}introduced themselves to Kaga.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}introduced themselves to Kaga.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Kaga\0{F87A,140}{F87B,140,12,1,1}{F813,0,112007}Alright. I'll remember that.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,112008}Well... I hope we meet again somewhere{F801}other than the afterlife.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Kaga\0{F87A,140}{F87B,140,12,1,1}{F813,0,112007}Alright. I'll remember that.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,112008}Well... I hope we meet again somewhere{F801}other than the afterlife.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Kaga proceeded into the depths of the{F801}Domain...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Kaga proceeded into the depths of the{F801}Domain...{F801}
